entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Highlights from UK government press conference on schools and PPE

text:
Why were no follow-ups offered to any journalists asking questions at the daily coronavirus press briefing by Health secretary @MattHancock today? 
If this continues it would be a backward step in terms of trying to hold the Government to account over the crisis.
